description.en:
The Trolls Token was created for the kids who grew up on the internet. Those who were around during AOL Instant Messenger, forums, mIRC, and knew how to rile people up. The days when you could have fun online without being cancelled. 


With the Trolls Token we aim to create a thriving community based around collectable NFT's. These NFT's can be collected as achievements, via contests, and by joining our monthly NFT Give Aways.

The Trolls Token and Community is being developed by a team with a dream, and we will not stop until we reach our goals!
